org.springframework.kafka.support

Class ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.support.ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type.
    V - the value type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProducerListener<K,V>
    Deprecated. 
    as the ProducerListener has default methods and can be implemented directly without the need for this adapter

    @Deprecated
public abstract class ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProducerListener<K,V>
    No-op implementation of ProducerListener, to be used as base class for other implementations.
    Author:
    Marius Bogoevici, Gary Russell, Artem Bilan, Endika Guti?rrez
